mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.introdate AS "introdate", a.employee_id AS "employee.id", u.name AS "employee.name", a.student_id AS "student.id", u1.name AS "student.name", u2.name AS "student.classes.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.employee_id LEFT JOIN crm_student_info u1 ON u1.id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN crm_classes u2 ON u2.id =u1.classes_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crm_student_introduce( id, introdate, employee_id, student_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{introdate}, #{employee.id}, #{student.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_student_introduce SET introdate = #{introdate}, employee_id = #{employee.id}, student_id = #{student.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
